Subject: Booker's Prize
data: 1 Which of the following authors won the Booker Prize twice ? A Margaret Atwood B JM Coetzee C Gtaham Swift D Ian McEwan Answer: Option [B]

2 Consider the following statements : I. The Man Booker Prize is awarded to citizen of any of the countries of the British Commonwealth or the Republic of Ireland. II. A leading London-based software company underwrites the Man Booker Prize presently. III. Marlon James won the Man Booker Prize 2015 for the book A Brief History of Seven Killings. Which of the following statements given above is/are correct ? A only I correct B I and II are correct C I and III are correct D All are correct Answer: Option [C]
3 In which field Booker Prize is given ? A Medicine B Adventure C Fiction writing D Science Answer: Option [C]
4 The Man Booker International Prize is given : A in every year B in every two years C in every three years D none of the above Answer: Option [B]
5 Who was the first winner of the Man Booker International Prize ? A Ismail Kadare B Alice Munro C Philip Roth D László Krasznahorkai Answer: Option [A]
